title: Mag Men Indian ethnic Navy Blue Matching silk Kurta Churidhar With Sky Blue Joot Waistcoat for Party/Wedding Wear
features: Steal the limelight at your next festive event wearing this kurta and pyjama/churidar set with nehru jacket/ waistcoat from MAG.
Design: This Traditional Indian pattern knee length kurta churidar set with jacket/ waistcoat underlines its casual and ethnic allure through its latest design. Regular fit.
Material: Soft Dupion Silk material specially fabricated for your skin which will provide you comfort with elegant and trendy look.

These trendy traditional ethnic Indian wear clothes are best for birthday, anniversary, wedding, get togethers, haldi, mehandi parties or any other festive occasion like diwali and eid. A perfect gift for your dad, husband, son, son inlaw or friend.

Brand :- MAG is one stop destination for all your party/ occasional needs. We understand that the clothes you wear are an extension to your personality and look forward for enhancing the same. The entire Kurta Churidar/Pyjama Set is made by an Indian artisan.
description: MAG as a brand brings you the best quality at affordable price. With an experience of over five decades, we take pride in manufacturing Ethnic Indian clothing and promoting the culture and pride of our country. Kurta Pajamas/ Churidar Kurta with Nehru Jacket/Waistcoat have always been the first choice of men when it comes to shopping for ethnic Indian wear, as they offer the utmost Style and comfort on various occasions to the wearer. Finest quality fabric is used for the collection. Different sizes, palette of colors, materials, patterns, sleeves, and fittings are available. Crafted with high-quality hand loomed in rich yarns of dupion silk which is curated to give a regular fit. Stylish and traditional, the Men's Full Sleeves Kurta is an attractive pick for your closet. Pair it with your favorite mojris and a pair of sunglasses to complete the look. Best quality at affordable price. We take pride in our commitment to maintain quality standards in each piece manufactured by us. Team this with a pair of mojaris to complete the traditional and classic look. If you buy Kurta's and kurta set's from our collection, Please note-The Chest sizes displayed are based on body measurement NOT actual apparel measurement. Kurta shirt's actual chest measurement (stich to stich, 1 inch below the arm hole) is 5 inches more than the displayed chest measurement. e.g. if kurta shirt's actual chest measurement is 45 inches, we display it as 40 inches. Washcare- Hand wash, Dip & Dry, Dryclean for longer life of product.

title: kurta pajama party wear for men
